statements: UPDATE SocialMediaMetrics SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SocialMediaMetrics SET shares = 75, comments = 20, likes = 120 WHERE post_id = 'd73ab33a-ff4d-4c03-82e7-6e97d42f1bfc';
UPDATE SocialMediaMetrics SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SocialMediaMetrics SET comments = 10, shares = 20, likes = 50 WHERE post_id = 'c94ba82f-a3c1-4ed4-b155-c82d2674292b';
UPDATE BrandMetrics SET likes = 5000, comments = 2000, followers = 10000 WHERE brand_id = 1;
UPDATE PostMetrics SET engagement_rate = 0.15, impressions = 8000, post_date = '2022-11-15 08:00:00' WHERE post_id = 5;
UPDATE BrandMetrics SET followers = 1000, likes = 500 WHERE brand_id = 1;
UPDATE PostMetrics SET engagement_rate = 0.05, impressions = 5000 WHERE post_id = 10 AND brand_id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers = 1000, engagement_rate = 3.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET likes = 500, comments = 50 WHERE account_id = 2 AND post_id = 10;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers = followers + 100, engagement_rate = 8.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET post_content = 'Updated post content', likes = 150 WHERE post_id = 5;
UPDATE social_media_platform SET engagement_rate = 0.8 WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE post_metrics SET likes_count = 500, shares_count = 200, comments_count = 100 WHERE post_id = 3;
UPDATE social_media_platform SET followers_count = 5000, engagement_rate = 5.7 WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE post_metrics SET likes_count = 100, shares_count = 50, comments_count = 20 WHERE post_id = 10;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = 15000, engagement_rate = 3.45 WHERE account_id = 101
UPDATE brand_performance SET total_engagement = 30000, average_engagement = 4.75 WHERE brand_id = 201
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = followers_count + 100, engagement_rate = 5.7 WHERE account_id = 101
UPDATE social_media_posts SET likes_count = 500, shares_count = shares_count + 50 WHERE post_id = 201
